column2: an A.M. Eatery////Now that that's out of the way
column3: Snooze utilized a "waitlist" feature.  We "logged in"
column4: checked in when we arrived and got a text when our table was ready.  We had 13 folks ahead of us
column5: and somehow got seated within 20 minutes.  Due to COVID
column6: Snooze doesn't offer free coffee while you wait.
